channel.title: RadioStar: Improv
channel.itunes:author: Cassandra's Call Productions
channel.description: Radiostar: Improv is a weekly, completely improvised theatrical radio show. New stories every week, spawned directly from the minds of some of San Francisco's sharpest improvisers.
channel.itunes:summary: Radiostar: Improv is a weekly, completely improvised theatrical radio show. New stories every week, spawned directly from the minds of some of San Francisco's sharpest improvisers.

item.title: Leveling Up the Corporate Ladder
item.itunes:author: Cassandra's Call Productions
item.description: The company president is having a bad day. The founder's daughter wants to marry him while simultaneously undermining his authority, and his vice president is using his position to engage in Dungeons and Dragons based team building exercises.
item.itunes:subtitle: It means more if you start out wearing a loincloth
item.itunes:summary: The company president is having a bad day. The founder's daughter wants to marry him while simultaneously undermining his authority, and his vice president is using his position to engage in Dungeons and Dragons based team building exercises.

item.title: Held Together With Paste
item.itunes:author: Cassandra's Call Productions
item.description: In this tale, we move back and forth in time, observing the web of connections between people and their common addiction, although the source of their misfortunes may not be what it first appears.

item.itunes:author: Cassandra's Call Productions
item.description: Recorded live at 50 Mason Social House, a fourteen year old boy is told by his mother that since he no longer takes care of his pony, he is contractually obligated to kill it. The boy is sent to the stable, where he is visited by the ghosts of pony past, future, and future-future.

item.title: Bad to the Last Bite

item.description: In a small unnamed village, the Blood Moon Festival is about to begin. For one couple, it may be a time to begin a life together, but others cower in the shadow of the great castle and the three vampires who live there. Little do they know that these damned souls intend to add to their number...assuming, of course, that they can get their act together in time.

item.title: Secrets of the Minnesota Bayou, Part 2
item.itunes:author: Cassandra's Call Productions
item.description: In this two part episode, a renowned hunter arrives at the Minnesota Bayou searching for the dangerous legendary Swamp Ferrets. He encounters an untrustworthy local and his enticing daughter. Posing as a cable television salesman, he overcomes the ferrets, but suffers a wound that slowly transforms him into one of the creatures. His only rescuers are local teenagers and a Bulgarian exchange student. there's also a bit about an ancient god and a giant sunken statue.
item.itunes:subtitle: Beware the bite of the Swamp Ferret.
